description.english: Locate unlucky Uzor, while your world’s turned upside down.
description.italian: Trova lo sfortunato Uzor mentre il tuo mondo è sottosopra.
description.german: Entdecke Uzor, der wenig Glück hatte, während deine Welt sich auf den Kopf stellt.
description.french: Localisez le malheureux Uzor alors que votre monde est sens dessus dessous.
description.spanish: Localiza al desafortunado Uzor, mientras tu mundo está al revés.
description.tchinese: 當你世界翻轉時尋找不幸的Uzor。
description.russian: Отыщите незадачливого Узора, пока все вверх дном.
description.japanese: 真っ逆さまな世界で、不運なウゾーを見つける
description.polish: Odnajdź pechowca Uzora, gdy twój świat zostanie wywróconym do góry nogami.
description.turkish: Dünyan tepetaklak olmuşken, talihsiz Uzor'u bul.
description.brazilian: Encontre o azarado Uzor, enquanto seu mundo vira de cabeça para baixo.

description.english: Recover one personal effect for each member of the Oceanova crew.
description.italian: Recupera un effetto personale per ogni membro della squadra di Oceanova.
description.german: Enthülle die persönlichen Schicksale jedes einzelnen Mitglieds der Oceanova-Crew.
description.french: Récupérez un objet personnel de chacun des membres de l'équipage d'Oceanova.
description.spanish: Recupera un efecto personal de cada miembro de la tripulación de Oceanova.
description.tchinese: 幫Oceanova船員中的每個成員恢復一個個人遺物。
description.russian: Соберите личные вещи всех участников проекта «Океанова».
description.japanese: オーシャノヴァクルー全員の遺品を回復
description.polish: Odzyskaj osobisty przedmiot należący do każdego członka załogi Oceanova.
description.turkish: Oceanova ekibinin her üyesine ait birer kişisel eşya bul.
description.brazilian: Recupere um objeto pessoal de cada membro da equipe da Oceanova.

description.english: Retrieve ID cards from each member of the Oceanova crew.
description.german: Sammle alle ID-Karten jedes einzelnen Mitglieds der Oceanova-Crew ein.
description.french: Récupérez l'ID de chaque membre de l'équipage d'Oceanova.
description.italian: Recupera l'ID di ogni membro della squadra di Oceanova.
description.spanish: Recupera las tarjetas de identificación de cada miembro de la tripulación de Oceanova.
description.tchinese: 從Oceanova船員中的每個成員檢索個人身份證。
description.japanese: オーシャノヴァクルー全員の ID カードを取得
description.polish: Odzyskaj kartę identyfikacyjną należącą do każdego członka załogi Oceanova.
description.turkish: Oceanova ekibinin her üyesine ait birer kimlik kartı bul.
description.brazilian: Recupere os cartões de ID de cada membro da equipe da Oceanova.

description.english: Find the light at the end of the tunnel.
description.german: Finde das Licht am Ende des Tunnels.
description.french: Trouvez la lumière au bout du tunnel.
description.italian: Trova la luce in fondo al tunnel.
description.spanish: Encuentra la luz al final del túnel.
description.japanese: トンネルの終わりに光を見つける
description.polish: Odnajdź światło na końcu mrocznego tunelu.
description.brazilian: Ache a luz no fim do túnel.

description.english: Locate the lifeless mother cuttlefish, surrounded by her spawn.
description.german: Finde die verstorbene Tintenfisch-Mutter, umgeben von ihren Sprösslingen.
description.french: Repérez la mère seiche décédée, entourée de sa progéniture.
description.italian: Trova la madre seppia priva di vita, circondata dalla sua progenie.
description.spanish: Localice a la madre calamar sin vida, rodeada por su prole.
description.tchinese: 找到無生命的母墨魚，被產卵包圍著。
description.russian: Найдите мертвую каракатицу, окруженную своим потомством.
description.japanese: イカの幼魚に取り囲まれた母イカの死骸を探し当てる
description.turkish: Etrafında yavruları olan ölü anne mürekkepbalığını bul.
description.brazilian: Localize a lula mãe sem vida, cercade por sua prole.

description.english: In our darkest hours, even a little amusement goes a long way.
description.german: Selbst in den dunkelsten Stunden muss ein kleiner Scherz erlaubt sein.
description.french: Même dans les heures les plus sombres, un peu d'amusement est le bienvenu.
description.italian: Nelle ore più buie, anche il minimo divertimento può aiutare.
description.spanish: En nuestras horas más oscuras, incluso un poco de diversión tiene grandes efectos.
description.tchinese: 在最黑暗的時候，即使是有點娛樂也很漫長的。
description.russian: Даже в самый тяжкий час есть время для шуток.
description.japanese: 暗いひと時、娯楽に癒される
description.polish: W mrocznych chwilach, nawet odrobina zabawy bywa bezcenna.
description.turkish: En zor zamanımızda, küçücük bir eğlence bile büyük bir keyif verir.
description.brazilian: Nas horas mais difíceis, uma pequena diversão ajuda muito.

displayName.japanese: ロールシャッハ ・ テスト

description.german: Weiche dem Tintenangriff eines Oktopus aus.
description.french: Évitez le jet d'encre d'une pieuvre.
description.italian: Sfuggi all'esplosione di inchiostro di un polpo.
description.spanish: Evade la explosión de tinta de un pulpo.
description.brazilian: Escape do ataque de tinta de um polvo.

description.english: Use a flare to distract a cuttlefish.
description.german: Lenke einen Kuttelfisch mit einer Fackel ab.
description.french: Leurrez une seiche en utilisant une fusée.
description.italian: Distrai una seppia utilizzando un razzo di segnalazione.
description.spanish: Distrae al calamar usando una bengala.
description.tchinese: 使用照眀彈分散墨魚注意力。
description.russian: Отвлеките каракатицу с помощью сигнальных ракет.
description.japanese: 照明弾を使用してイカを追い払う
description.turkish: Fişek kullanarak, bir mürekkepbalığının dikkatini dağıt.
description.brazilian: Distraia uma lula usando um sinalizador.

description.english: Defeat a cuttlefish, before it gets too close for comfort.
description.german: Besiege einen Tintenfish, bevor er zu nahe kommt.
description.french: Terrassez une seiche avant qu'elle s'approche plus que de raison.
description.italian: Sconfiggi una seppia prima che ti si avvicini troppo.
description.spanish: Derrota un calamar, antes de que se acerque demasiado.
description.tchinese: 在墨魚太靠近之前，打敗它。
description.russian: Победите каракатицу, пока не стало слишком поздно.
description.japanese: イカを接近しすぎる前に打ち負かす
description.polish: Pokonaj mątwę, zanim ta się znajdzie zbyt blisko ciebie.
description.turkish: Bir mürekkepbalığını, sana çok yaklaşmadan önce öldür.
description.brazilian: Derote uma lula, antes que fique comfortavelmente perto.

displayName.spanish: En la Boca de la Locura

description.english: Defeat an anglerfish, before it gets a grip on you.
description.german: Besiege einen Armflosser, bevor er dich zu packen bekommt.
description.french: Terrassez une baudroie avant qu'elle ne s'accroche à vous.
description.italian: Sconfiggi una rana pescatrice prima che ti afferri.
description.spanish: Derrota a un pez Rape, antes de que consiga agarrarte.
description.tchinese: 打敗琵琶魚，在它抓住你前。
description.russian: Победите морского черта, пока он не стал контролировать вас.
description.japanese: アンコウに捕まる前にそいつを打倒
description.polish: Pokonaj żabnicę, zanim ta dosięgnie ciebie.
description.turkish: Bir fener balığını, seni yakalamadan önce yen.
description.brazilian: Derrote um tamboril, antes que eu te agarre.
